Reviews.Title: “Courtyard by Marriott in Ocean City is GREAT!!”
Reviews.Author: DonnaLynnMaryland
Reviews.Content: stayed courtyard marriott ocean city maryland weekend wonderful front desk staff helpful arrived 2 hours earlier check time ready nice balcony found lovely clean nicely decorated view boardwalk ocean balcony beds extremely comfortable quiet heard noise guests restaurant hotel called captains table excellent ate breakfast lunch dinner food service portions generous prices reasonable waitresses pleasant friendly couldnt door restaurant called sea italian food pool lovely little chilly covered parking car overflow lot close hotel july 2009 fairly managed stay highly recommend hotel nice hotel ocean city

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, clean, and friendly staff”

Reviews.Content: booked ajoining ourselves extended family oceanfront balcony nice summer months staff friendly helpful guest clean tastfully decorated lobby screen computers internet access december hotel terribly busy people staying enjoyed breakfast dinner restaurant true cafeteria feel food wonderful waitstaff bar tv guys enjoy game poolhot tub wonderful walls windows 2 changing showers 2 separate bathrooms pool overall comfortable positive experience feel trapped hotel spaces sit relax enjoy drink read paper summer location boardwalk

Reviews.Title: “This is our new go-to place in Ocean City!”
Reviews.Author: Coppercat
Reviews.Content: loved stay courtyard traveling business 20 am particular hotels property beautiful looks smells brand huge extremely clean cant beat location perfectly content staying weekend thats inviting experience hotels oc pretty rundown pleasantly surprised courtyard familiar courtyards dont expect usual breakfast buffet property actual sitdown restaurant serves food day breakfast food fresh delicous reasonably priced trust cant wrong courtyard
